page_content:
Address:
Scientific Circle of Mathematicians UMK
Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science, UMK
12/18 Chopina St.
87-100 Toruń
E-mail address: knm@mat.umk.pl
Room: F204
Contact to members of the Circle Board:
Current Board of the Circle (for the academic year 2023/2024):
* Chairperson: Agnieszka Gołembiewska, e-mail: agagolembiewska@mat.umk.pl
* Deputy Chair: Adam Konysz, email: adamkon@mat.umk.pl
* Secretary: Łukasz Kotlewski, email: kotlewskilukasz@mat.umk.pl

Board of Directors of the Circle (for the academic year 2022/2023):
* Chair: Aleksandra Lewandowska, email: 297125@stud.umk.pl or lewand@mat.umk.pl
* Deputy Chair: Igor Bialecki, e-mail: 297117@stud.umk.pl or igorbialecki@mat.umk.pl
* Secretary: Adam Konysz: e-mail: adamkon@mat.umk.pl

Contact to the supervisor of the Circle:
* Dr. Robert Skiba, e-mail: robert.skiba@mat.umk.pl
